St Pauls challenge, or The Churches triumph: in a sermon, preacht at the Fort-Royal March 3. 1643. By Jer: Leech. And now published at the request both of the generous; and his much honored friend captaine George Dipfort. Leech, Jeremiah.
[2], 22 p.
Printed by Thomas Paine, and are to be sold by Francis Eglesfield at the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library. Annotation on Thomason copy: "may 27.".
=======
